text: Bought me some good gardening hoes, now I can really rip into that ripe soil. #justgardenerthings #gardensonly.com
Gotta exterminate those woodchucks! Been dreaming about it at night tbh… #totallysane #justgardenerthings #pleasediewoodchucks

While trying to plant some tomatoes, I can’t help but think… What if plants think? Like… Bruh. What if plants are listening to us as spies for Russia… #justgardenerthings #gardensonly.com #plantsarespies

Went fishing on my farm and I found a super old fish!!! He’s pretty old and battered so I let him go back into the water which is filled with gasoline from my crappy boat! Good luck surviving now! #BigFish #gardenlife #gardensonly.com
